title: Guma, Plains Farmer (4C277)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Rohan
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Ally • Home 4T • Man
Strength:	4
Vitality:	2
Site:	4T
Game Text:	Villager. Discard Guma if an opponent controls his home site. Fellowship: Exert Guma to heal a [Rohan] Man.
Lore:	Foodstores swelled as refugees like Guma brought provisions to the Hornburg.
Rarity:	C
